name.short: Service subdomains and autodiscover for calendars, contacts, and email are now enabled by default.
name.long: Service subdomains and autodiscover for calendars, contacts, and email are now enabled by default.

content.abstract: The new, extended cpdavd service works best with service subdomains and autodiscover enabled. Because of this, we now enable the Service subdomains and Thunderbird and Outlook autodiscover and autoconfig support Tweak Settings by default.
